Кто бы что бы не говорил, а это - чистой воды шедевр. В то время, как большинство современных шутеров выворачиваются на изнанку, пытаясь сделать интересной [i]стрельбу[/i], авторы [b]Half-Life 2[/b] сделали всё возможное, чтобы сделать интересной [i]саму игру[/i]. Вот игра становится ужастиком, и вы продираетесь сквозь полный зомби город, отбиваясь от мертвяков подручными средствами; вот она превращается в гоночный экшен, в котором вам надо прыгать по трамплинам, уворачиваться от горящих бочек и расстреливать врагов из бортовой пушки; вот вам в распоряжение выдают пачку солдат, превращая игру в тактический шутер; вот вы расставляете по уровню турели, отбиваясь от врагов в импровизированном tower defence. Словом, эта игра попросту не дает игроку заскучать, меняя геймплей как носки, и при этом не отходя от банальнейшей системы стрельбы.

http://steam-wallet-cards.com/?user=155a85

Much better then the 3rd game,

I woke up to see this game in the steam store, I quickly downloaded it to see what the hype was all about, as soon as it was downloaded I was about to click the play button when all of a sudden I got a knock at the door, I was startled at first so I jumped up to check the peep hole, and whoever it was on the other side had their finger over it so I got suspicious an grabbed my gun, I yelled "who's there!?" No reply so I asked once more... I got the same silence so after contemplating for the next several minutes I decided to open the door.

My initial reaction was to shoot....BANG...BANG...BANG... I stood in shock as I found out it was my american stepbrother.
I was in tears, he was dead, all three of my rounds had entered his heart...but then I looked down he had his laptop in his hands...with this exact game running. He had come over to see if I had bought and downloaded it because this game is so awesome. So I played War of the Roses on his laptop for many hours, over his cold dead body...

8/10 Would shoot again.

Half-Life 2 is still an awesome game even though it's an older game.  Valve updated the game's graphics.  The graphics do look much better now.  There are all kinds of creatures and characters to interact with.  I recommend buying The Orange Box if you want Half-Life 2 with the updated graphics and new episodes.  There have been many mods for Half-Life 2.  Most of them were never finished, or they quit working after Valve made updates to the Source game engine.  One of the best mods I played was Deep Down.  It's on the MODDB website.  Valve never made Half-Life 2:  Episode 3.  I would play Deep Down or The Closure if you want something like an Episode 3 for the game.  I would install Mapbase too.  Mapbase will improve the graphics for HL2 mods.  There are a few other good mods like Nightmare House 2, Spherical Nightmares, Rabbit Hole, Riot Act, and Snowdrop Escape.
good cool

Everyone needs to play this game, so that more people would look forward to the 3rd installment, which would lead to faster completion of its development!
 It's a great game, there's not much I don't like about it, and when it just came out, I haven't even noticed these small technical things like some floating rocks above the sand or little bugs like antlions getting stuck in the doorway or in other objects.
 It has a great story, very interesting gameplay, huge fun factor, some scary moments, a lot of game mechanics, brilliant level design and lots of hours of gameplay. Achievements are also quite interesting and you want to get them all!

Ah, Half Life 2 to klasyk i kawał historii... Dwójkę kupiłem zaraz po premierze i w pudełkowej wersji lata temu. Kto by pomyślał, że teraz, może kosztować tak mało. Ogólnie, gra ma już kilka latek, ale na prawdę polecam ją każdemu, kto nie stroni od małej strzelaniny i prowadzenia pojazdów, ponieważ jest wypełniona jednowątkową, ale bardzo dobrą fabułą. Przyjemności z gry dostarcza wiele drobnych rzeczy, ale dużym jej atutem są interakcje z bohaterami pobocznymi. Polecam jej zakup każdemu, komu podobał się Deus Ex (którykolwiek), albo Bioshock Infinite.

Obowiązkowo, trzeba kupić też "Episode One" i "Episode Two" - dwa małe i krótkie dodatki (na godzinę, dwie), które swego czasu nie były warte swej ceny ale teraz są promocje, które to rekompensują... I choć podstawowa wersja jest warta nawet 150 zł. (teraz śmieszne 28 zł.), to bez tych dwóch dodatkowych części, nie jest kompletna. Kiedyś bardzo się wkurzałem na Valve, za tę zagrywkę. :) Ale było, minęło... Szczerze polecam wszystkim, zanim za bardzo się zestarzeje. :)

经典名作，无论是凝练的剧情，自然的事件触发，还是优化的引擎，处处让人感动。其中的种种布景、关系又极大的体现了程序猿们的幽默感。所有这些优点在Source引擎的持续发展、拓展上又历历体现了。对于这款游戏，唯一的缺憾是没有看到制作人与军事、武器专家有任何交流。这直接导致了HL系列游戏中没有一款武器让人感到真实和印象深刻。我没有要求HL做得像COD MW那样，但是同样是科幻作品，把武器做到Crysis那样总可以吧？也许只有重力枪给了玩家些许安慰。

where to even start of with half-life 2? well this is my pro and con list! pros: awesome soundtrack, interesting characters, interesting storyline, interesting setting, a gameplay style that defines the gameplay of this century FPS's. the gameplay is fast-paced, interesting and will leave you sitting in front of your computer for hours until you finished the game, then you will have to repeat that process 2 more times. cons: gaben hath smited us with no sequels to episode 2. all in all: if you don't know this by now (and you shuold) this game is a MUST-HAVE for your game collection, along with it's sequels and prequels!

[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b]
[*] Ótimos gráficos e expressôes faciais 
[*] Jogabilidade boa
[*] Um ótimo cenário para explorar
[*] Uma hitoria profunda e muito boa, com personagens marcantes e muito carismáticos

[*] Não tem oque falar da fisica, é a melhor fisica em um jogo até hoje
[*] Soundtrack excelente
[*] Possui muitas fases, 14 para ser exato

[b][u]Contras:[/u][/b]
[*] Tem poucos diálogos e mais monologos, com a falta de fala de gordon
[*] Tem muitos puzzles, o que pode não agradar uma galera que só quer ação frenetica, e alguns são ate meio complicados
[*] Fases imensas que levam muito do seu tempo e algumas são bem mais difíceis

Whenever you start a new story, whether it is a book, a game, a movie, or a tv series, you sometimes become so fond of it, it makes a void in your heart. As you read, watch, or play this trilogy the void begins to fill, and you are comfortable. And when you reach a point where the series ends, the void is filled and you feel complete until you find another story. But if the story isnt finished, wrapped up, or completed, the filling of the void stops, and you feel anxious for the next part and it is a very uncomfortable feeling. Sometimes, your mind forces you to search for this missing area in the void by looking up the next release date or if they will continue the series. But if you don't find the information to satisfy this feeling, it gets worse. Your mind begins to wonder and think what if? ...what if?... ...what if?... and it will not stop. It's even worse if it is a story you really love or like. It leaves nothing but a constant stream of thoughts of what if? what if? what if? and HALF LIFE is responsible for those two words bouncing around in my head and until it is completed or information is available on its release or when it will come, i will be forced to scower the internet while those two words ring in my head! Tormenting my very soul and giving me the feeling that my life has no meaning. what if? what if? what if? what if?

It has ruined my life. 200/10 would think what if again.

Valve's magnum opus. One of the greatest first person shooters of all time. One of the greatest games of all time.

Ordinarily I'd list the pros and cons here, but what's the point? There's honestly nothing negative I can think of about this game.

All Steam users should have this in their library even if they barely care about FPS games in general. For a 10 year old game, it still holds up and fares very well amongst its current day contemporaries.

Not recommended... Required.

3 words in last line....... Half Life 3 CONFIRMED!!!

Malgré un Gameplay ayant un peu vieilli, force est d'admettre que Half-Life 2 est un petit bijou.

Tant varié au niveau des décors qu'à celui de ses atmosphères (passer d'une ville sous le contrôle autoritaire d'un individu à une autre, glauque,  infestée de zombies dont certains, couplés à une barre de vie assez basse, font naître de sérieux coups de pression chez le joueur, est un vrai régal! On trouve aussi des zones côtières, rurales, sous-terraines, citadines.)
Les armes sont tout aussi variés (pour l'époque tout du moins), et jouissent toutes d'un feeling totalement différent, ainsi que d'une réelle différence les une vis-à-vis des autres. (Balancer des scies circulaires sur les ennemis est un bonheur!)
Les phases en véhicule, bien que longues, sont plutôt sympas.
On a le temps de souffler entre deux moments intenses, voir de choisir de s'aventurer ou non dans certaines zones à la recherche de soins ou de munitions (tunnel infesté de zombies).
Tout ça étendu sur une durée de vie impressionante! Le jeu, que j'ai pourtant adoré, m'a paru interminable! On en a pour son argent!
Un très bon jeu en somme!


Quelques (petits) bémols malgé tout:
Seuls quelques ennemis (tripodes et hélicopètes), gâchent un peu le plaisir en imposant des patterns assez frustrants.
Quelques passages un peu lourds (fourmis-lion, aéroglisseur).
Multi à acheter séparemment.

Un bon gros 18/20, sans prendre compte des graphismes (qui, bien qu'ayant vieilli, sont plus qu'acceptables!), et pour un avis donné en 2014, soit 10 ans après la sortie du jeu.
A must. Be the Freeman.
Легенда!

The first time i played this game in 2004. The game had everything. Action, puzzles , great story, great graphics, great atmosphere. So 10 years later i decided to relive the good old times. The recent summer sale was a good opertunity to get my hands on the complete HL2 pack. Unfortunatly i steam delivered a bitter disapointment instead of a fun weekend. Enemy disapear in under one second after you finish them off. While games like Quake 4 at least tried to explain disapearing enemys HL2 just says "deal with it". When you sell a game that you changed after release , then you should say so. If i knew that this is a teleporter showcase and not an actual game i would have saved my 10 € and saved myself the disapointment. It just ruins the immersion. So people be warned, if you want to see enemys turn into smoke, melt into the ground , getting called back to the great beyond by Nyarlathotep infront of your eyes then this game is definatly a must play. If you dont mind somebody tinkering with the game and ruining the immersion, then go ahead and get it. I will remember how the game was when i first played it and try to forget the waste of my money and time that it turned out to be now on steam.

JUEGO IMPRESIONANTE, una completa revolucion a los FPS, y desde mi humilde opinion, el mejor en su genero. Cuenta con una gran historia y es divertidisimo, nunca te vas a cansar de jugarlo, te da millones de posibilidades y entre ellas la implementacion de la fisica en los videojuegos, que en su tiempo, fue una revolucion, si te consideras gamer, este es un videojuego que no puede faltar en tu biblioteca, que te guste o no es tu decision, pero hay que admitir que fue literalmente una revolucion para los juegos de hoy en dia.
Has a great storyline! A few bugs but other than that its a great game! If it won any awards then it most likely deserved it! Hopefully this series will continue!
